history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + qsimpl use: Forall_inv. + qsimpl use: Forall_inv_tail,Forall_inv. - intros [H1 H2]. qsimpl use: Forall_inv_tail,Forall_inv,Forall_cons.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type P : X -> Prop x : X ll : list X H : Forall P (x :: ll) The term "P" has type "X -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Forall ?P (?a :: ?l)".

exceptions.tactic: apply (Forall_inv_tail X P x ll H).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type P : X -> Prop x : X ll : list X H : Forall P (x :: ll) The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "Forall ?P (?a :: ?l)".
In environment X : Type P : X -> Prop x : X ll : list X H1 : P x H2 : Forall P ll The term "x" has type "X" while it is expected to have type "Forall ?P ?l".

original: intros X P x ll. split. - intros H. split. + apply (Forall_inv P x ll H). + apply (Forall_inv_tail X P x ll H). - intros [H1 H2]. apply (Forall_cons X P x ll). + apply H1. + apply H2.
